title: Can't sign into eBay
content:
A week or so ago (About the 18th July) I found that I could no longer log into eBay with Firefox.

When I try to log in it comes up with a big read banner with the words "We ran into a problem. Please try again later." inside it.

Using any other browser works.

I am just assuming an update, either Firefox or Windows has broken something.

I disabled my Firewall to see if that had any effect... no, it didn't.

I am not running any ad blockers.

I have also found others who have suffered the same issue on another forum.

Any idea's?

Cheers, Glenn

title: Keep specific cookies while deleting others on exit
content:
Is there a way to keep specific cookies while deleting others on exit?

The "Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed" option ignores the "Manage Exceptions" option, which exists for nothing, since allowed exceptions are also deleted on exit.

title: My data won't sync from my other device
content:
So, my old computer recently broke, but I luckily recovered all my files. I was re-downloading Firefox onto this computer, but my bookmarks and add-ons and stuff won't sync. When I searched for the solution to this, I saw someone having a similar-ish problem (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1403774#answer-1563248), but they just said they had to wait awhile for it to sync. Now, I have a couple questions that I can't seem to get the answer to:

1. How long does it take to sync my data? How long did that person have to wait?

2. What if it never syncs and that person just got lucky? Is there some sort of alternate way to fix this faster?

I'd really appreciate help on this topic, but I'm not the best with computers. If anyone has had this problem, and figured it out, please let me know! I had a lot of bookmarks and a good amount of add-ons, I really would like to not lose those.

title: WidevineCDM plugin has crashed. On all DRM protected video streaming services that I could test.
content:
On Windows 11, for the last two days, whenever I try to open Netflix, it says "WidevineCDM plugin has crashed". I've also tried Amazon Prime Video and Apple TVs+. It always crashes and displays the crash thing and asks me to submit report.

I also use firefox on a Linux distribution that is dualbooted on the same machine. No crashes there. I recently updated my graphic card's vBIOS and firmware(RTX 4080) using the utility provided by the manufacturer of the card. But even after updating this and rebooting, I was able to watch a couple of episodes of a show without any problems. However, the second time I tried to open Netflix after the {graphics card updates + reboot} + {1 or 2 extra reboots} the plugin has been crashing on me constantly.

I think it might be a graphics card thing or a Windows thing. The problem is, there seems to be very little information on troubleshooting anything related to Widevine. I found no information on how to delete it and re-install it. I have tried to enable Integrated graphics only in BIOS and plugged the monitor into one of the motherboard's display output(for integrated graphics). Same result.

I have submitted crash reports: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/3d9cc9fa-7f6b-465a-9895-e2b6b0240724 https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/73835b7c-7393-47ee-94b8-d24410240724

title: I want Firefox to open with the BBC website
content:
This has worked until recently.....

I switch on the PC - Windows 10 +Firefox.......... I enter a 4-number ID code, press Enter and my Desktop is displayed It is then up to me to click on the Globe on the bottom status line then my home page opens - the BBC website

What used to happen and which I wish to restore is.......... I enter a 4-number code, press Enter and my Desktop is displayed, then, without me doing anything, the screen displays the BBC website - https://www.bbc.com/news - automatically.

Can't find out how to do this again - can you help please?
creator: Bonnie2

title: Firefox 115 excessive writing to disk on Windows 7 only
content: I still have a computer with Windows 7 and I still love using it despite that the world wants me to give it up and upgrade, which I have with several other computers I own, but I enjoy my uncluttered and non-super-spyware-laden Win7 system, but I get the feeling that Firefox is purposely trying to upend a smooth browsing experience for those of us who are stubborn and unwilling to part with our old systems, and yes, I am a VERY suspicious person. They are doing this in Win 7 [and not on any other system I own of higher OS] by having FF constantly writing huge amounts of nothing to my disk, taking no less than a minute each time. What does this do ? It causes STALLING of any and all functions until some internal clock decides to stop and release the system from this turmoil. FF is hoping the user will get so frustrated that they will give up on Win7 and go to the hyper-surveillant Win11, but some of us are infinitely patient and will wait for the day when FF says "You can no longer browse the internet with this version of Firefox," and I know that day will arrive. Thanks, Soros. So my question is, if there's even an answer ; is there anything I can do besides all the usual page long crap of suggestions about computer maintenance, all of which are trite and redundant, so that I do not have to put up with this constant stalling via overwriting to disk ? Even Norton shows logs of FF excessive writing to disk and lists it in the Norton history. None of this EVER happened until the notice arrived, what, a year ago or so, that M$ and FF were no longer supporting Win7. How coincidental that I should now have to endure some kind of psychological torment for not allowing my entire computer experience to be surveilled by the DEMONS THAT BE. Thank you, and if you find my rhetoric too inflammatory, then just forget it, but understand how sick to death of you meatheads I am.
creator: maxjenke

title: Radomly funky fonts
content: I am sure you have had endless posts regarding this issue, but for me, it is still ongoing. Randomly and without warning, I can have pages full of funky fonts that is unreadable. Usually, closing the browser and reopening it does the trick, but when I have several important tabs opened within the session, that can be a bit of a pain in the ass especially when I reopen, all is lost. Is there something on my end I can do to keep this from occurring. In other browsers, this does not happen. Please help. Thanks. :D

 Versatile, accomplish professional with 30+ years of overseeing daily agribusiness operations, improving overall business functions, training of departments heads, managing budgets, developing strategic plans, creating policies and communicating business goals, rich leadership experience in managing all aspects of total quality management in large-scale agribusiness and food manufacturing industries with a wide portfolio of FMCG products.  Expertise knowledge and working experience of development, implementation, auditing and continual improvement of integrated management systems covering quality & food safety management (ISO 9001, ISO 22000, HACCP), Organic farming and Global GAP- standards overall sustainable agriculture processes.  Comprehensive domain and technical experience in management QC. Laboratory operations including food chemistry & microbiology labs. To assure high quality standards from raw & packing materials through in-process to final products complying with national & international standards, statutory/ and regulatory frameworks.  Capable of implementing programs based on plan-do-check-act (PDCA) cycle of action plans to continually improve processes, performance, and productivity, mitigate risks and resolve customer complaints.  Schedule and conduct on-site vendor food safety and quality assessments through collaboration with internal stakeholders for new potential vendors.  Investigate and resolve quality issues, customer complaints, and non-conformances, implementing corrective and preventive actions  Proactive achievement driven professional with strong work ethic, integrity and excellent communication, coordination, problem solving, decision making, strategic plans & execution skills.

Areas of Specialization 

Agricultural: Cultivation, Production and Processing operations :

 Cultivation & production of different types & varieties of Conventional and Organic fruits such as dates palm, Bananas, Grapes, tropical fruits & rootstocks ( Mangoes, Orange, grapefruits, Lemon ,,etc.).  Processing & Packaging of dates conventional and organic such as whole dates, vacuum packs and processed dates paste and Syrup.  Biotechnologies & industrial production of in- vitro & out- vitro tissue culture plants( Banana, Potatoes, Dates palm, Pineapple,, etc.)  Greenhouse, glasshouse, shade houses horticultural production, hydroponic farming & open field facilities for production and packaging of different types of organic fresh vegetable produces and fruits as well as nurseries for grafted of fruit seedlings and plantlets.  Biotechnologies Laboratories management (Foods, Feeds, Soil ,Water, Plant Protection/Diagnostic and Microbiological Laboratories).  Processing & packaging of different types of Ready to Salad Vegetable’s.


Animal & livestock husbandry, production and processing operations:  Quails, Layer & Broiler Poultry farming, Organic Agricultural Farming, Dairy Farming, Beef Cattle and Sheep Fattening Projects.  Animal Feed Milling Industry, Green & Dry forages and Processing of Compost & heat treatment organic fertilizers. Dairy Products, Juices and Beverages food manufacturing:  Fresh milk, Fermented milk (Laban), UHT milk (Whole & flavored long life milk, Set & Stirred Yoghurt’s Cream, Labneh, Mish and Cheeses.  Fresh & Long life Juices, Fruit Drinks, Beverages and production of Potable and Packaged drinking water.

Agricultural & Animal Production Project - Subsidiary of ZADNA Int. Co. for Investment Ltd. - Sudan - January 2021 - until now www.zadna.net. com Deputy Project Director & Agricultural Management Consultant 

Team: 230

Role Purpose  Manage overall responsibility for agri-business project operations in strategic plans for short & long terms development for new and existing farms.  Act as expert advisor & technically guide to follow and adhere to compliance high quality standards of plants, production yields and regulatory.  Drives continual improvement, development, implementation and maintenance across overall agribusiness operations.

Responsibilities  Overall responsibility for entire farm operations & work closely with management team for plantation schedules and formulating, evaluation and approval of annual strategic plans, goals , budgets to achieve objectives and goals related to cultivate, land preparation, soil health & fertility, irrigation, fertilization, chemical applications, integrated pest management, plant protection, pollination and pre/post-harvest handling practices that can bring sustainable farming approaches and value chains to improve farm operations.  Monitor the cost of quality across the agribusiness operations and implement measures to achieve savings assuring budgetary compliance.  Ensure all staff and project facilities adhere to GAPs, GHPs, EHS, GMPs , ,etc. standards and regulations.  As the consultancy: Provide best efficiency studies and supervision services on new and existing farms and supporting facilities for optimum transformation to generative and sustainable.  Developed feasibility studies, layout, designs and execution master plans with organization management.  Developed and supervision with the field research programs and recommendations with necessary publications in collaboration with universities and governmental authorities.

Faapy for Food Industries Co.(Dairy & Beverage manufacturing) Subsidiary of ZADNA Int. Co. for Investment Ltd. - Sudan | January 2020 to November 2020 General Manager Report to: CEO - Team: 375 Role Purpose  Oversee day - to day operations of the business activities and provide direct management of key managers and executives in the business units.  Improve overall business functions, training heads of department, managing budgets, developing strategic plans, creating policies, build sustainable business performance and communicating business goals.  Continuously review, development and assessment Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for functions and reflect business needs by adopting principles of continual improvement. 

Responsibilities

 Design strategic plans & set goals, support and promote the company vision, values and encourage staff performance complying with company policies, objectives, procedures and work instructions to evaluate and improve operations and financial performance.  Lead the business and driving force behind the entire manufacturing, production facilities and scheduling progress measurement to all around back office operations.  Provide guidance and directions for all resolutions of planning and issues (profit decline, employee conflicts, loss of business) as they arise.  Investigate and define problems, complaints and recommending root causes identification analysis results.  Provide and maintain high standards of food services, hygiene, healthy, safety and environmental working conditions for all facilities and develop and issues training program and the optimal utilization of the staff and resources.  Assist the department managers in decision – maker if requested and solving problems by identify key facts, explore alternatives and propose corrective / preventive solutions at minimum cost.  Implement of wining customer strategies to target and achieve a high level of success in developing sales revenues.  Assist the company within the services portfolio and highlight opportunities for development and improvement through control budgets and optimize daily expenses.  Carry out regular reviews of contractor’s performance against budget and strategic plans, reviews, implement and evaluated remedial.  Develop and maintain a continuous improvement mindset to supply chains management, product sustainability and services delivery that generates (added value) to business.

AL- Rajhi International for Investment (RAII), Riyadh, KSA | January 2016 to April 2018 http://www.raii.net Manager – Total Quality Management & Dates Processing Plant Report to: CEO - Team: 150 

      Key Accountabilities

 Manage all aspects of Total Quality Management of the organizations agribusiness divisions comprising of organic date palms & banana farming pilot projects, dates processing plant, tissue Culture Laboratory and beef cattle projects.  Establishment, maintenance and development of consistent TQM structure, policies, objectives, processes, quality plan, standard operation procedures, work instructions, specifications, site specific protocols (In line to the business vision, mission & strategy).  Communicate & embed the corporate TQM / QHSE strategy across the organization by provide ongoing guidance, setting of KPIs of business divisions for implementation.  Designs and implement training sessions, workshops, orientation programs and guidance across projects and on sites to ensure employees are up-to- date with the continuous support to the business competency framework.  Develop, review and update corporate (TQM) policies, quality manual and processes to ensure on-going compliance with internal & external standards and creating efficiencies within business.  Closed cooperation and lead efforts with incoming materials suppliers and supply chain to formulated & improve quality, regulatory standards, minimizes the time and cost saving of inspection and contributes to ensure compliance with all relevant food safety regulations and industry standards.  Driving customer and consumer complaints reduction.  Facilitate and setting up of subsequent internal & external assessment audits for the organization.  Organize and participate in the management review meeting (facilitate the continuing improvement) as per the required intervals.

Mohammed Abdul-Aziz Al-Rajhi Endowments, Riyadh, KSA | September 2014 – Sept. 2016` http://www.alrajhiawqaf.sa

Manager – Total Quality Management Report to: CEO - Team: 12 Responsibilities  Manage all aspects of Total Quality Management & Food Safety Management of the organization’s agribusiness division comprising of large plantations of dates palm farming, cold storages and modern date processing plant with producing different types of date products (Pre-packaged whole dates, pressed dates, date dough, stuffed dates, date paste and sweets from dates.  Develop, implement and update quality policies, objectives, quality plans, standard operating procedures (SOPs), and processes for document control, product traceability, monitoring, recall/withdrawal and vendor qualifications to meet certification requirements.  As the Management Representative (MR): provide quality plan schedules and organize internal / external audits, mock recall/withdrawal drills, coordinate management review meetings and ensure corrective & preventive actions for non-conformities.  Supervise the food safety & HACCP team in developing HACCP process, plans & charts, identify PRPs, OPRPs, CCPs and setting limits and action points.  Planning and coordinate investigation of all major/critical quality failures, identify root causes and implement effective corrective and preventive action plans.  Provide quality management support related to vendors & sub-contractors including pre-qualification & validation of new vendors as well as quality audits & risk assessments of existing vendors.  Participate in the verification, validation and approval of all new processes and equipment.

Highlights  Established, developed, certificated & implementer a documentation control system for all processes and ensuring adoption of the latest versions/revisions to ensure effective implementation and maintenance of FSMS – ISO 22000:2005 & HACCP systems and Global G.A.P standards across the agriculture divisions.  Revamped the overall organization of the TQM department and built a team of qualified FSMS coordinators to achieve all corporate objectives related to quality and food safety systems.  Managing an effective program for training food safety team members and skilled operations personnel on awareness & internal auditing for FSMS, HSE, GMP, GHP, G.A.P. and pest control.

Al Khalediah Agricultural Co Ltd, Riyadh, KSA | October 2001 – October 2013 www.alkhalediah.com Manager – QA/QC Department Reported to: CEO - Team: 18


Responsibilities:  Manage & provide overall directions and control to the Quality Assurance/Quality Control function of the organization including formulation, implementation and updating of quality policies, plans and objectives to comply with integrated quality and food safety management systems.  Monitoring all aspects of quality and food safety across the value chain assuring that all company products & services met national & international standards and regulatory requirements.  Manage the operations of the QA/QC labs. Ensuring execution of all required chemical analysis and microbiological tests of raw materials, in-process and finished products.  Chaired the food safety management committee and as Management Representative (MR) to ensure implementation and maintenance of integrated management systems covering ISO 9001, ISO 22000, HACCP, Organic Farming and Global G.A.P systems.  Organize and participate in management review meetings with the top management to establish measurable & verifiable performance indicators & objectives to sustain and continually improve the effectiveness of the integrated management system.  Lead HSE committee and drove programs including audits, compliance and training to ensure adherence to occupational health, safety, environmental, food hygiene, cleaning / sanitation and pest control standards.  Established quality plans, standards and specifications for all raw materials, packing materials and finished products and led periodic revisions to maintain adherence to current statutory and food safety requirements.  Lead investigations of all customer complaints, non-conformity reports & emergency situations related to potentially unsafe products & services, identify root causes and implement effective & durable corrective and preventive action plans.  Maintain the annual calibration master plan of all equipment & instruments in QA/QC labs. And other food handling facilities and ensured on time calibration status.  Support & guide company personnel with on-site orientation and training programs in building and sustaining all quality and food management standards.  Coordinate all internal & external surveillance audits and followed up on time close-out of non-conformities through corrective & preventive actions. Highlights  Established the QA/QC. Department & new food laboratories with all required processes, procedures and facilities including chemical and microbiological labs.  Made significant contributions in securing & sustaining certifications to ISO 9001, ISO 22000, HACCP, and Organic Farming and Global G.A.P standards.

Najran Dairy Company │Najran KSA │December 1987 – September 2001 http://www.najrandairy.com

Responsibilities:  Manage overall QA/QC activities covering all factory sections to ensure compliance with specifications, SOPs, to achieve, implement and maintains company’s quality standards and objectives.  Supervise day-to-day operations of the QA/QC. Laboratory including performance of required chemical & microbiological tests, interpretation of results and issue of technical reports.  Participate in contributed to research & development activities for developing new recipes as well as enhancement of quality of existing products.  Formulate & implemented quality plans, standards, specifications and inspection sampling plans to ensure quality of incoming raw materials & packing materials, in-process goods and final finished products.  Ensure effectiveness of the company’s cleaning/sanitation program by selecting and ensuring quality of all detergents and sanitizers.  Predict & validate shelf life stability of packaged finished products and recommended appropriate storage conditions and expiry dates for various products.  Record & investigated quality issues, customer complaints, product withdrawals/recalls, and non-conformities – identified root causes and implemented corrective and preventive action plans.  Use statistical quality control (SQC) tools and techniques to identify opportunities for process

title: Ad blocker
content:
I am repeatedly kicked out by YouTube, because I seem to have one or more ad blockers active. My problem is that I even don't know where to find them, so that I can deactivate them. I have tried earlier to find a solution, but to no avail. Apparently there are more people having this problem.

I am now forced to watch YouTube on Edge, which feels like treason, because I am a Firefox user for many years.

In case you would have a solution, please don't bombard me with geek talk. I am an IT layman.

I use an Acer lptop with Windows 11

title: What's the latest on tabs not being consistent with task manager?
content:
Since "Flash Player" has been discontinued by Adobe since 2020 - and by force since 2021 - what is the solution? Yesterday, it told me I had 20 "tabs" open in Task Manager - but I clearly had less than 10.

The problem here is... my fan gets loud because of this - and that is very frustrating at night. Watching a video, and then hearing a storm brewing, right in your ear.

I've attempted Fan Control software, but it's way too complicated for my capabilities. It seems to do barely anything, unless you have a specific set of hardware - and a certain amount of know-how.

Ps. I am referring to the thread, created 6 years ago, here on the forum. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1223023

title: Firefox browswer failed to check for update.
content:
I am on a Windows 10 Pro PC 64 Bit OS with 16GB of memory, running Bit Defender Total Security. I have used Firefox for many years and have never had a problem The browser is version 128.0.2 (64-bit). A few days ago in the application menu told me there was an update and said to install it because it couldn't check for updates. I downloaded and installed it three times now, but the problem still persists. My Bit Defender also keeps popping up messages telling me "firefox.exe attempted to establish a connection relying on an unmatching security certificate to aus5.mozilla.org. We blocked the connection to keep your data safe since the used certificate was issued for a different web address than the targeted one." I have had over 2000 of those messages in the past few days.

I have never had an issue like this before. Is there a glitch in the most recent update? What can I do to fix it outside of resetting my browser, which logs me out of my google accounts and causes me to not be able to get back into them.

title: Background tabs triggering master password popups
content:
I have a lot of tabs open, and I don't know which are responsible for the popups. Previously, I'd get 2-3 unexpected popups per day (that were not triggered by navigation in visible tabs), but since yesterday, every ~10min I'm getting 2 popups right after each other.

How do I find out what tab is triggering them?

Besides the annoyance, I find it worrying that firefox apparently "intends" to input login details into background tabs - if I had entered my master password previously, I wouldn't even notice that the password store had been accessed.

It would be really nice if the master password popup had a button to view the triggering tab (and perhaps highlight the fields that would have been filled after unlocking), but until that happens, I really need some way to locate the problematic tab(s)...

title: Mozzila Fire Fox se desconfigura
content:

Utilizo o Windows 11 toda vez que ligo o notebook o fire fox ele desconfigura e aparece como se estivesse acabado de ser instalado, onde a personalização do tema, e da aparência se desconfigura e perde toda as configurações toda vez que o notebook é ligado ou reenciado quando ocorre uma atualização no Windows.

Gostaria de saber como resolver esse caso! Sem ter que re-configurar tudo de novo, pois já tem um perfil, já exclui e criei outro perfil e o problema volta!
